body:
File: interpreter/interpreter-generator.cc
Ignition handlers relevant to with/lookup and context/global load/store, and ToObject:
- IGNITION_HANDLER(CreateWithContext, InterpreterAssembler): loads object from reg, scope_info from constant; calls Runtime::kPushWithContext via CallRuntime; sets accumulator to new context.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupSlot, InterpreterAssembler): name from constant; CallRuntime(Runtime::kLoadLookupSlot, context, name); SetAccumulator.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupSlotInsideTypeof, InterpreterAssembler): same but kLoadLookupSlotInsideTypeof.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupContextSlot, InterpreterLookupContextSlotAssembler)::LookupContextSlot(Runtime::kLoadLookupSlot, ContextKind::kDefault) with fast path: GotoIfHasContextExtensionUpToDepth -> LoadContextElement or LoadScriptContextElement, else slow path runtime call.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupScriptContextSlot): same with ContextKind::kScriptContext.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupContextSlotInsideTypeof): same with typeof.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupScriptContextSlotInsideTypeof): same with typeof.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupGlobalSlot): InterpreterLookupGlobalAssembler::LookupGlobalSlot(Runtime::kLoadLookupSlot): fast path loads via LdaGlobal IC builder if no extension; slow path CallRuntime.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(LdaLookupGlobalSlotInsideTypeof): typeof variant.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(StaLookupSlot, InterpreterAssembler): parses flags; branches to Runtime::kStoreLookupSlot_{Strict,SloppyHoisting,Sloppy} calls; sets accumulator.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(PushContext, InterpreterAssembler): saves old context to reg; sets new context from accumulator.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(PopContext, InterpreterAssembler): restores context from reg.
- IGNITION_HANDLER(ToObject, InterpreterAssembler): CallBuiltin(Builtin::kToObject), store result to register operand.
explanation: This captures Ignition bytecode handlers for with-scope and lookup-slot semantics, showing exact runtime calls and the incorporation of context extension checks fast paths, as well as PushContext/PopContext and ToObject handler.
